Back to Edvard Grieg

Edvard Grieg

At the Halfdan Kjerulf Statue, EG 167

1874

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 5'

  • 1. Poco adagio
  • 2. Andante

These are arrangements of two pieces for unaccompanied men’s choir.

Recommended editions

  • Samlede Verker (Peters) · I/4 · Arrangementer av egne verker · ed. Dag Schjelderup-Ebbe
  • Könemann · K 168 · Arrangements of Own Works · ed. Thomas Aßmus
  • Peters · EP 3100d · Piano Works / IV / Miscellaneous Works

1. Poco adagio

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

2. Andante

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5
